channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Calendar

item.title: CVE-2022-39915|2024-08-03T12:07:42.988Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20calendar
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Calendar prior to versions 11.6.08.0 in Android Q(10), 12.2.11.3000 in Android R(11), 12.3.07.2000 in Android S(12), and 12.4.02.0 in Android T(13) allows attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.
